title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4116.12 - Qualification for trainer's license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4116.12 - Qualification for trainer's license

State Regulations

Every applicant for a trainer's license shall satisfy the
commission in such manner as it may prescribe that such applicant has had at
least one year's training experience under a recognized trainer and has
demonstrated the ability to train, that such applicant is knowledgeable of and
conversant with training of harness horses, that such applicant is physically
and mentally competent to train, and that such applicant is familiar with the
rules pertaining to trainers and training. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4116.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
